Description: Large limestone ostracon: with remains of fifteen lines of black-painted hieratic text on the recto and a further three lines of text on the verso, giving a hymn to Amun.
Curator's comments: J. J. Černy and A.H. Gardiner, ‘Hieratic Ostraca’ (Oxford 1957), pl. 89; fomerly numbered 5656a. Bibliography: S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London, 1868), pl.XXVI; A. Erman, 'Zeitschrift für Ägyptische Sprache und Altertumskunde' 42 (1905), pp.106-9; Ch.Lenormant, 'Description des antiquites egyptiennes de la collection Raife' (Paris 1867), no.440
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389928) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389928)
